1.content: Sam was walking up the steps of his school with his brothers by his side. He always walked them inside for his parents. They all went to a private school that had student from toddler age to 12th grade. Sam was excited to be starting 6th grade this year and to see his friend Matt after he was away for the summer. They all walk inside you dad had stopped at this strange store on the way to school to get you a drink. You get inside and walk Andrew to his toddler class. Seth had already run off to join his friends. As you are walking to class you pop open your drink. As soon as you swallow it you feel strange. You drop to you knees as the world begins spinning. What was in that drink? When everything finally calms down you look up and scream. Everything was now extremely huge. You estimated yourself to be around the size of a grain of salt. You need help you stand up to see you are outside....
1.title: Tiny at school...Uh Oh!!!

A hard stream of pee hits the wall behind you. Huge droplets fall around you like gigantic rain drops. The soap became softer and more slippery. The stream comes closer as he stops and hits you. You hold onto the surface and...

As this happens the surface below you begins to soften. Your feet begin to sink into it. The boy finishes and flushes. The water fills the urinal but you are luckily able to stay on the urinal cake.

121.content:
You plop into a sticky goo on a soft brown surface. The surface is squishy like a mattress and the goo acts like a glue. A sickly sweet smell is the first thing you notice before seeing the building sized milk carton Next to you. You panic and thrash around trying to get free but you only make yourself sink down faster.

A shadow covers you and you look up into the hungry face of your friend, Matt. “Matt! Matt, help me!” You yell, only for him to lick his lips as his fork stabs around you. “Yummy. Pancakes are my favorite.” He says as he opens his mouth wide. “No! Stop! Don’t ea...!” You’re cut Off as he seals you into his mouth and begins to chew.

Your surroundings become chaos, in the pitch black darkness of his mouth, as you are tossed around with the mush and saliva mixture. Soon he stops chewing and his tongue pins you to the roof of his mouth as he swallows. You are on the tip of his tongue as he opens wide and you jump from his mouth.
121.title: On top of Matt's breakfast

You feel hopeless until you realize you can climb his shirt. You jump up and start to climb up. After at least 10 minutes, mat stands up. You grip as tight as you can as he puts away his tray and walks towards...

You try scrambling to the top and slide back down to clutch at the robot as the box shakes and multiple hands start to grab toys.
135.title: Toy land

1353.title: The robot is picked up but you fall off onto th...

choices: Just before Andrew gets hold of you, you manage to flee
13533.content:
The six year old boy sees you, but because of your size he thinks that you are an ant, and reacts in a way that most six years old would have done.
"EEEW! icky bug" the child whines out, a few of the nearby children hears his whines and walks over curiously.

"Whats the matter?" an other six year old asks, the boy with the toy shows you,
"Oh, its an ant, there might be more of them, you should show the teacher so she can let it out on the grass" the other boy suggests.
All of a sudden, a giant face comes into your field of view just in front of the toy, huge brown eyes where looking down on you.

"Cool!! you hear a familiar voice yell out, the face backs away a bit from you, and you see that its your brother Andrew.

"Oh my god..." you think to yourself, as your remember back to the summer, when you and your brothers were on the beach, the biggest enjoyment Andrew had found was to torture and kill small bugs, mostly with his bare feet, he had found an ant road next to the sand and had spent literally hours walking on the ant road, having the best time, mushing as many ants that he could under his bare feet... so yeah, not really a bug friendly kid.

"Don't you think it is disgusting Andrew?" the sixth year old with the toy asks. "nu hu, not a chance" Andrew answers exited.
"well, i dare you to eat it then!" the boy said.
Andrew thought for a while, he hadn't eaten anything alive before and found it a bit of putting, but he was also afraid of the social pressure that backing down from a dare meant.

"ah, give it to me" Andrew snaps and takes the toy with you on it from the sixth year old, Andrew hold you up to eye level, you are frozen in fear, hopping that he perhaps wouldn't see you if you where just still enough, but no such luck, Andrew had seen you. "Hey little ant" he mockingly says, "I am going to take you on a little journey" he continues telling you with a childish voice, "This is where it begins"

Your four year old brother opens his maw wide, just an inch or so from you, you feel the warm moist air hitting you when he breaths, you can see the entire inside of his mouth, he had lost several of his milk teeth, so there was a lot of empty gaps where teeth should have been, saliva was falling from his upper teeth and began to pool at the bottom of his mouth, you could even see his uvula and the back of his throat, all of a sudden you saw his throat tense up and a thundering wet belch erupts from the depths of your brothers gut, you get covered with spit and the foul smell of digesting milk and cereal that he had for breakfast this morning.

He closes his mouth and laughs when he sees how his burp had drenched your entire body, "Haha, and after i put you in my mouth i will swallow you, and you go down here" the toddler says as he shows with one finger going from his chin, down along his throat, to his belly. "all the way to my tummy, and when you are in there you are my food! and then i will pee you out from my wee" the toddler says in excitement.

info.brief_description: You shrink to the size of salt at school.
info.description:
12 year old Sam arriving for his first day back at school since summer break. Sam went to a private school which had students from toddlers to 12th grade. On his way to school his mom buys him a strange drink. After drinking it he shrinks to the size of a salt grain.

Sam, 12, brown hair brown eyes, loves athletic wear.
Seth 8, his little brother, mini version of Sam
Andrew, 4, Sam littler brother, blond hair and brown eyes
Matt, 12 Sam's best friend

RULES and please follow them:
NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS THEY WILL BE DELETED. Please be descriptive as possible.
DO NOT END MY STORY LINES UNLESS YOU ASK ME ABOUT IT FIRST AND I APPROVE
All unaware Sam does not enjoy any of the interactions he encounters.
Vore is encouraged as well as underwear interaction and accidental encounters with private areas
NO Females
No interaction with adults unless it is brief.
Boys ONLY
No Butt or poop related stuff, just not liking it
Feet is ok but don't overdo it.
He is immune to death so he can't die.

Any questions please ask and please help add, This story will only grow with help..

Happy Reading!!!
